titleStmt.title: Tintinnalogia, or, The art of ringing wherein is laid down plain and easie rules for singing all sorts of plain changes together with directions for pricking and ringing all cross peals with a full discovery of the mystery and grounds of each peal : as also instructions for hanging of bells, with all things belonging thereunto / by a lover of that art.

Tintinnalogia, or, The art of ringing wherein is laid down plain and easie rules for singing all sorts of plain changes together with directions for pricking and ringing all cross peals with a full discovery of the mystery and grounds of each peal : as also instructions for hanging of bells, with all things belonging thereunto / by a lover of that art.
titleStmt.author: White, Thomas, 1593-1676.
Duckworth, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F.S. and are to be sold by Tho. Archer ...,

notesStmt.note: Variously attributed to Thomas White and Richard Duckworth.
Imperfect: pages tightly bound with some loss of print.
Formerly identified as Wing W1847 (number cancelled).
Item at reel 338:11 identified as Wing W1847A.
Reproductions of original in the Bodleian Library.
